title: Bannon Warns of #Me Too Backlash, Changing Digital Ads, Doctors and Gun Control
itunes:title: Bannon Warns of #Me Too Backlash, Changing Digital Ads, Doctors and Gun Control
description:
Joshua Green, Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent, explains why Steve Bannon sees the #Me Too movement as trouble for Republicans. Jeff Green, CEO at The Trade Desk, discusses changing the way advertising is brought to their software platform. We Drive to the Close with Doug Ciocca, CEO at Kavar Capital. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Associate Professor of Medicine at NYU, shares the doctor’s role in preventing gun violence. Carol and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson have today’s “Movers and Shakers” and “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
